title: The Extraordinary Adventures of David Collins, Trading Titan

story.text: David Collins discovers an ancient coin among a collection of items he's trading. This coin mysteriously grants him the power to manipulate probabilities, making unlikely events occur at will.
Testing his new abilities, David manipulates the probabilities to prevent a bank robbery simply by making the criminals' weapons jam unexpectedly.

David starts experimenting more with his powers. He saves his neighborhood from a small fire by increasing the probability of rain, which unexpectedly starts pouring down in just seconds, extinguishing the blaze.
Realizing the potential of his powers, David decides to use them for the greater good. He anonymously tips off the police about hidden criminal activities, leading to several arrests.

David ventures into the stock market, using his powers sparingly to nudge probabilities in favor of struggling companies with ethical business practices, giving them a fair chance against their corrupt competitors.

David feels the strain of continuously controlling probabilities and decides to take a break to focus on his hobbies. He finds peace and recuperation while producing music and researching trade markets.
David saves a lost child in a crowded festival by increasing the probability of the child hearing his mother's voice over the loud noise, reuniting them amidst the chaos.

ending: David Collins becomes a hero not in cape, but with a coin, proving even the smallest change can make a world of difference.
moral: With great power comes great responsibility, and sometimes the greatest heroes are those who choose when not to use their power.
